ygData.subject: Armor & Absorption is all AC.

ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 19 Jul 1999 Morix@... wrote:
> Yes as a matter of fact there is. Regular leather, studded leather, and
> reinforced leather (I believe) all have ths same stats in AC and weight, but
> have incresingly higher damage absorption values. Otherwise, what would be
> the point of studded and reinforced leather?

*grin* I'll try this one more time. Gave up on the last one due to
closed mindedness.

Studded is identical to Leather but can be created by trade skills. That
is the advantage to Studded (slight or negligable as it seems).

Reinforced Leather (I believe) has a higher AC and thus is _better_ than
both normal and Studded Leather.

I have direct confirmation from Verant that AC is the Damage Absorption
constant. There are no other values for damage absorption hidden.

To maximize damage absorption, maximize AC.

That's just the way it is.

Drew
